greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Inverse permutation to A254107.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..8192
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
program: (Scheme) (define (A254108 n) (let ((col (A254111 n)) (row (A254112 n))) (* (/ 1 2) (- (expt (+ col row) 2) col row row row -2))))
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jan 27 2015
